name: Geopod XE
summary:
Geopod XE is a sequel to Geopod, and is similar to Wipeout. The levels tend to have a bit tighter spots, making the pace a bit slower compared to Wipeout. 
 
Geopod XE has a greater set of tracks to compete in, and many new pods to fly. Like the original Geopod, it has a simple league mode and allows you also to buy some upgrades to the pods, making them faster or easier to handle, for example.
